conclusion: The problem involves an ideal gas changing states as indicated by arrows in a figure.
The graph shows pressure (p) vs. volume (V) with points A, B, C, and D marked.
Segment BC is a hyperbola with vertical and horizontal axes as asymptotes.
Temperature at state A is given as 300K.
Determine the temperature at state C.
The temperature of the gas in state C is 150K.
